title: Arabic 36
text: Rejoice in the gladness of thine heart, that thou mayest be worthy to meet Me and to mirror forth My beauty.

prev.title: Arabic 35
prev.text: Sorrow not save that thou art far from Us. Rejoice not save that thou art drawing near and returning unto Us.

next.title: Arabic 37
next.text: Divest not thyself of My beauteous robe, and forfeit not thy portion from My wondrous fountain, lest thou shouldst thirst forevermore.
